data.message: I love Messenger,it allows us to send audio,video and pictures and to open camera right there to click picture and also the great calling feature in Messenger is awesome,I enjoy free calling on Messenger.....Nobody should hate Messenger,everyone should love it...Also it allows us to send lot of smileys and cartoons which is awesome....I just Love <3 Messenger...thanks facebook for the messenger

replies.message: Thank you for the compliment, Roßin! We're so glad to hear you're enjoying the Messenger App. We're continually working to improve the Messenger experience for everyone and if you ever have any suggestions, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1qNvh6t. Thank you for being a part of our community. -Chantal
Thanks Chantal :)
You're welcome, Roßin! -Chantal
And please check my other question
I love it too. It's convenient not to have to open FB to see and reply to friends messages.
I like Messenger as well !
You do realize that you could do all that with the existing messenger, minus the making calls, right? Besides...you're on a phone...making calls is what those do!

I wanna ask everyone here,why everyone is scared of camera and recordings,facebook has nothing do with it,facebook is not free to look what he/she is doing,they have their own work,facebook already mentioned many times the messenger is very safe to use,it doesn't have any issues with camera or recording,people made it a big issue,it's all false rumors,everyone don't be scared of messenger,stop blaming facebook company for messenger,we should thank facebook for awesome features in messenger instead of hating it..There are millions of millions of people on facebook,facebook is working so hard on privacy issues for safety for people..So again stop hating messenger,don't get scared oh ! Am I on recording?! :D
Have those of you that posted you love messenger read the security concerns? It has been all over the internet!

We understand your concerns, Victoria. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1ASFpgB. -Sarah
Robin Singh do you work for facebook because this looks like a setup up conversation to me :D
:) i hope get a reply from facebook page :)
Hello Farid! We hope you have a great day. -Sarah
I uninstalled Messenger because I couldn't turn off the little head notifications. They kept popping up covering the whole screen. I couldn't play my game with that stuff in the way. So I removed it.
plis help
Mohamed  I don't work for facebook,I have my opinion to say I like Messenger,may be you don't like but I like Messenger

Just because an app insists that you grant total control of your phone to allow it to function isn't a reason that you should. I'm not about to be foolish enough to allow total control/access to my cell phone in exchange for wanting to send/receive a message on FB. the fact FB is requiring such a condition is cause for alarm.
'am new to Messenger. Require more acquaintance.
Facebook Messenger has improved a'lot lately,Thanks Facebook for bringing us Close
I don't appreciate being forced to dl an App that I don't want.   Nor do I care to turn my device's telephone capabilities over to FB.  I not going to install it.
I don't want it for all of that stuff. I just want to send messages. I also want to be able to use a single app. Forcing users to use two different apps is stupid.
Facebook, please cut your homophobia or my friends and I are outie. http://www.thegailygrind.com/2014/09/18/facebook-warns-drag-queens-will-delete-every-profile-two-weeks/

Why are you allowing this Roßin Singh person to keep her profile the way it is? ß might look like a B, but first off, no legal name has a capital in the middle and ß is not an actual letter. It's just a symbol that looks like a B. This is not her legal name. You should force her to change it to Robin Singh or delete her profile.
Is there a messenger for PC?

Hi Теодор. At this time the Messenger app is only available via mobile device. We're hard at work on continued improvements to the Messenger app. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1DnEPeV -Chantal
